## Test

```{r}
lm_0 <- lm(mpg ~ 1, data = mtcars)

lm_all <- lm(mpg ~ wt + hp + cyl, data = mtcars)

lm_cyl <- lm(mpg ~ cyl, data = mtcars)
lm_wt <- lm(mpg ~ wt, data = mtcars)
lm_hp <- lm(mpg ~ hp, data = mtcars)

lm_wt_hp <- lm(mpg ~ wt + hp, data = mtcars)
lm_cyl_hp <- lm(mpg ~ cyl + hp, data = mtcars)
lm_wt_cyl <- lm(mpg ~ wt + cyl, data = mtcars)
```
